problem_text_cn: 在长方形ABCD中AB=16,如图所示裁出一扇形ABE,将扇形围成一个圆锥(AB和AE重合),则此圆锥的底面半径为()
problem_text_en: In the rectangle ABCD, AB = N_0, cut out a sector ABE as shown in the figure, and enclose the sector into a cone (AB and AE coincide), then the bottom radius of the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:设圆锥的底面圆半径为r,依题意,得2πr=\frac{90π×16}{180},解得r=4．故小圆锥的底面半径为4；故选:A．
